org.bluezoo.gumdrop.telemetry.SpanKind

  • Packages that use SpanKind 
    Package Description
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.telemetry
    OpenTelemetry implementation for Gumdrop.

    • Uses of SpanKind in org.bluezoo.gumdrop.telemetry

      Methods in org.bluezoo.gumdrop.telemetry that return SpanKind 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      SpanKind Span.getKind()
      Returns the span kind.
      static SpanKind SpanKind.valueOf​(java.lang.String name)
      Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
      static SpanKind[] SpanKind.values()
      Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.
      Methods in org.bluezoo.gumdrop.telemetry with parameters of type SpanKind 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Trace TelemetryConfig.createTrace​(java.lang.String rootSpanName, SpanKind kind)
      Creates a new trace with this configuration.
      Trace TelemetryConfig.createTraceFromTraceparent​(java.lang.String traceparent, java.lang.String rootSpanName, SpanKind kind)
      Creates a trace continuing from a remote context.
      static Trace Trace.fromTraceparent​(java.lang.String traceparent, java.lang.String rootSpanName, SpanKind kind)
      Creates a trace from a W3C traceparent header.
      Span Span.startChild​(java.lang.String name, SpanKind kind)
      Starts a new child span with the specified kind.
      Span Trace.startSpan​(java.lang.String name, SpanKind kind)
      Starts a new child span under the current span.
      Constructors in org.bluezoo.gumdrop.telemetry with parameters of type SpanKind 
      Constructor Description
      Trace​(java.lang.String rootSpanName, SpanKind kind)
      Creates a new trace with a generated trace ID and a root span.
      Trace​(SpanContext parentContext, java.lang.String rootSpanName, SpanKind kind)
      Creates a trace continuing from a remote span context.
